entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:26 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 9:11 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
